single_cell_parser.network_param_modify_functions.multi_stimulus_trial(netp, inter_stimulus_interval=100, stims=100, scale_factors=None, pop=None)[source]¶

makes a network param file for repeatedly simulating the same whisker stimulus. There is also the option to apply a different evoked activity scaling factor to each stimulus. inter_stimulus_interval: int, milliseconds to wait between each whisker stimulus stims: int, number of stimuli to simulate scale factors: list, optional. A list of scale factors you want to apply to subsequent stimuli. Must have the same length as stims. pop: list, optional. The celltypes you would like the scaling to be applied to.

single_cell_parser.network_param_modify_functions.set_stim_onset(n, onset=None)[source]¶

changes the offset when pointcells get activated
